mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, type, third_user_id, third_union_id, extra_info, created_time, created_user, updated_time, updated_user, version, delete_flag FROM sys_user_third_account WHERE type = #{type} AND third_user_id = #{thirdUserId} AND delete_flag = 0 LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user_third_account ( user_id, type, third_user_id, third_union_id, extra_info, created_time, created_user, updated_time, updated_user, version, delete_flag ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{type}, #{thirdUserId}, #{thirdUnionId}, #{extraInfo}, NOW(), #{createdUser}, NOW(), #{updatedUser}, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user_third_account SET third_union_id = #{thirdUnionId}, extra_info = #{extraInfo}, updated_time = NOW(), updated_user = #{updatedUser}, version = version + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND version = #{version} AND delete_flag = 0
UPDATE sys_user_third_account SET delete_flag = 1, updated_time = NOW(), updated_user = #{updatedUser}, version = version + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND version = #{version} AND delete_flag = 0
